column5: Anybody else notice an increase in both size and numbers of steelies this Autumn? Fish below nailed a Marabou jig (Daiichi Hook)   and was quickly released after the photo. Cheers.
Nice!!  I nailed a fat brownie on Wednesday on one of the Riverwood Rabbit XL jigs (pink and blue)
Beauty silverstreak Thanks for sharing Leechman

increase in numbers to say the least...last spring was a fa nominal run right into early June....so far this fall the fish numbers are staggering and the size and strength is outstanding !!!...  thats a beauty fish ...nice shootin ...   but the salmon run up here was no hell as opposed to last year...

It's amazing what cooler summers with lots of precip will do. I know in the credit we are seeing tonns of smolts all over the lower river, there were even yoy brown and steelhead smolts in and around streetsville this summer.   Rich.
